short_definition: A defense proving that the accused, at the time of the commission of the crime charged, was at a different place than the scene of the crime, so that he could not possibly have committed it.
long_definition_html: A defense proving that the accused, at the time of the commission of the crime charged, was at a different place than the scene of the crime, so that he could not possibly have committed it.
